Enum Class ConvertOption

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<ConvertOption>
space.sunqian.common.object.convert.ConvertOption
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<ConvertOption>, Constable, Option<ConvertOption,Object>
public enum ConvertOption extends Enum<ConvertOption> implements Option<ConvertOption,Object>
Option for object conversion and data mapping.

  • Enum Constant Details

    • STRICT_TYPE_MODE

      public static final ConvertOption STRICT_TYPE_MODE
      Option to enable strict type mode. In strict type mode, the target type for wildcard and type variables will be strictly converted.

      This option is disabled by default, in this case, the target type for wildcard and type variables will be converted as their bounds type. For example, the target type of ? extends String will be treated as String.

    • OBJECT_SCHEMA_PARSER

      public static final ConvertOption OBJECT_SCHEMA_PARSER
      Key of schemaParser(ObjectSchemaParser).

    • MAP_SCHEMA_PARSER

      public static final ConvertOption MAP_SCHEMA_PARSER
      Key of schemaParser(MapSchemaParser).

    • PROPERTY_MAPPER

      public static final ConvertOption PROPERTY_MAPPER
      Key of propertyMapper(DataMapper.PropertyMapper).

    • EXCEPTION_HANDLER

      public static final ConvertOption EXCEPTION_HANDLER
      Key of exceptionHandler(DataMapper.ExceptionHandler).

    • IGNORE_NULL

      public static final ConvertOption IGNORE_NULL
      Option to ignore copy properties with null values. If a PROPERTY_MAPPER is set, this option becomes invalid. This option is disabled by default.

    • IGNORE_PROPERTIES

      public static final ConvertOption IGNORE_PROPERTIES
      Key of ignoreProperties(Object...).

    • DATA_MAPPER

      public static final ConvertOption DATA_MAPPER

      By default, ObjectSchemaParser.defaultParser() is used.

      @Nonnull public static @Nonnull Option<@Nonnull ConvertOption,@Nonnull DataMapper.PropertyMapper> propertyMapper(@Nonnull DataMapper.PropertyMapper propertyMapper)
      Returns an option to specify the DataMapper.PropertyMapper.

      By default, all properties which is both readable and writable will be copied with their original names.

      Parameters:
      propertyMapper - the DataMapper.PropertyMapper to be specified

    • ignoreProperties

      @Nonnull public static @Nonnull Option<@Nonnull ConvertOption,@Nonnull Object @Nonnull []> ignoreProperties(@Nonnull @Nonnull Object @Nonnull ... ignoredProperties)
      Returns an option to ignore copy properties with the specified property names (or key for map).

      By default, all readable properties will be attempted to be copied.

      Parameters:
      ignoredProperties - the names (or key) of ignored properties
      Returns:
      an option to ignore copy properties with the specified property names (or key for map)
